about_the_game:
A young and powerful ninja Tobimaru brought all his rival clans together in an alliance with the power of his divine orb but the peace did not last long. His village was attacked without warning. His orb was shattered right before his eyes and his power left him. He embarks on an old-school platforming adventure with challenging combat puzzles to reclaim the fragments of his orb and seek justice for his fallen villagers.

FEATURES


  • Timing-based combat system with the ability to dodge any time
  • Platforming abilities to let you traverse like a true ninja
  • Smooth frame-by-frame animations
  • Currencies and buy power-ups from merchants
  • Challenging combat puzzles to put your skills to the test
  • New abilities and moves to learn
  • Melee and ranged combat
